snippet.title: Group effort needed to save our sick planet
snippet.content: THANK you Mr Buick for your comments (Daily, July 28). I think the problem is what you described in your previous letter (Daily, June 27) in that the world has changed and you are having trouble keeping up with it. In fact, you sounded confused and are still hanging on to conventional beliefs. I gave up on these beliefs when they failed to speak truth to me about this wonderful evolving world we inhabit. I have never been religious and Einstein covered it when he declared there is no personal God or a God that intervenes in human affairs. It is place of irrationality that so many people continue to have value in this misguided belief system. The "green monster" you refer to is a strange way to describe our life support system, our Earth mother. Human carelessness, ignorance, arrogance, and rampant destructive behaviour is spoiling, if not killing, the planet. However, Mr Buick I do believe in your humanity and I can only wish you a good life. We are all in this together and we face immense common challenges that we must work to repair.
